Data Fields
pmhalPowerDomain Struct Reference

Structure defining the power domain properties. These parameters define the properties of power domain and allow to configure PD to different states. More...

#include <hw_pmhal_data.h>

uint32_t pwrStateStatusRegAddr
 

Detailed Description

Structure defining the power domain properties. These parameters define the properties of power domain and allow to configure PD to different states.

Field Documentation

pmhalPrcmCdId_t* pmhalPowerDomain::clockDomainId

Clock Domains present in the PD

uint8_t pmhalPowerDomain::numClockDomain

Number of Clock domain elements present in the power domain.

uint8_t pmhalPowerDomain::numMemoryModules

Number of memory elements present in the power domain.

uint8_t pmhalPowerDomain::numResetDomain

Number of reset domain elements present in the power domain.

pmhalPrcmPhyMemBankId_t* pmhalPowerDomain::phyMemoryBankId

Memory present in the PD

uint32_t pmhalPowerDomain::pwrStateCtrlRegAddr

Power domain state control register address - ON/OFF/Retention

uint32_t pmhalPowerDomain::pwrStateStatusRegAddr

Power domain state status register address - ON/OFF/Retention

pmhalPrcmResetGroupId_t* pmhalPowerDomain::resetId

Reset domain ID to which the power domain belongs to.

uint8_t pmhalPowerDomain::validLogicRetState

Supported logic retention state for a given power domain

uint8_t pmhalPowerDomain::validLowPwrRequest

Supported low power request for a given power domain

uint8_t pmhalPowerDomain::validPwrStates

Supported power states for the given power domain

uint8_t pmhalPowerDomain::vdId

Voltage domain ID to which this power domain belongs to. Refer pmhalPrcmVdId_t for details.
